discourse_list.title: Work with BlockScience on Sybil/Collusion Resistance for QF

content.content: If you are reading this then you are invited to join the weekly data science working sessions on collusion resistance for Quadratic Funding .  Details here Other collateral on QF collusion resistance thats come out of this so far:  Optimality Gap Approach Research Plan ML Working Group Plan  Blog Posts  Colluding Communities or New Markets? - Gitcoin's Blog How to Attack and Defend Quadratic Funding - Gitcoin's Blog Gitcoin Grants Round 8 Governance Brief - Gitcoin's Blog Towards Computer-Aided Governance of Gitcoin Grants - Gitcoin's Blog
content.GPT-summary: The post invites readers to join weekly data science working sessions on collusion resistance for Quadratic Funding. It also provides links to other collateral on QF collusion resistance, including research plans, ML working group plans, and blog posts.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party or author wants to collaborate on proposal

content.content: priceless!! I was going to ask about it. Happy to receive so many valuable resources. I want to dig into this documentation before I join the next session/group task force. For the records, I had a good conversation with the Proof of Humanity team who is also in close collab with BrightID. this is one of the greatest combined efforts to solve the issue. I’m happy to burn some neurons together with the team

content.content: Super excited to work with the Gitcoin team and community as a part of block science
